participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Creative and nostalgic, Jessica enjoys expressing herself through dance and appreciates the music from her childhood.
participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. i love new kids on the block. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80s.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Friendly and outgoing, Mike thrives in social situations and finds fulfillment in helping others.
participant_2.background: i volunteer in a homeless shelter. i'm a professional wrestler. i enjoy being around people. in my spare time i do volunteer work.
